title: New: Young & Sick – Glass
content:
‘waiting for my shadow to undress’

Sitting on Harvest Records alongside the likes of BANKS, Arthur Beatrice and Glass Animals, it’s fair to say that Young & Sick is in pretty good company.

Having contributed vocals to a MMOTHS track way back when, he’s beginning to make his first steps as a solo artists, with a handful of tracks now on his Soundcloud, and his debut LP set for release on 8 April. Atmospheric and undeniably pop, it’s upbeat, and certainly the most ‘single suited’ of the tracks uploaded thus far. Check out Glass below, and catch Young & Sick at Coachella, SXSW and on tour with Foster The People.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
